channel.title: How do I change skills exp rate?
channel.description:
please how do i change skills xp rate? i couldn't find it in config.java , my source is divinefate PI
i need more help i may able to pay u $ add me skype: areyou.mad

item.title: How do I change skills exp rate?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

the actual xp rates will differentiate. You may have to go into that skill class and actually change it and I believe actionhandler handles some of the rates as well.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change skills exp rate?

item.title: How do I change skills exp rate?
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

What are you using to try to find it? Just the basic ctrl + f function? Try using ST2’s find in files option and set the path it searches in to your source path.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change skills exp rate?

item.title: How do I change skills exp rate?
item.dc:creator: @General_Z General Z
item.description:
@General_Z wrote:

Null Amount:

If it’s like the original PI source, look for MELEE_EXP_RATE or WOODCUTTING_EXPERIENCE in your source files. If you find one, you will probably find all of them.

nop didnt find anything

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change skills exp rate?
